falstad
Class FirstPersonDrawer

java.lang.Object
  falstad.FirstPersonDrawer

public class FirstPersonDrawer
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates all functionality for drawing the current view at the maze from a first person perspective. It is an drawing agent with redraw_play as its public method to redraw the maze while the user plays, i.e. navigates through the maze. This code is refactored code from Maze.java by Paul Falstad, www.falstad.com, Copyright (C) 1998, all rights reserved Paul Falstad granted permission to modify and use code for teaching purposes. Refactored by Peter Kemper

Draws the first person view on the screen during the game

Parameters:
gc - graphics handler to manipulate screen
px - x coordinate of current position, only used to get viewx
py - y coordinate of current position, only used to get viewy
view_dx - view direction, x coordinate
view_dy - view direction, y coordinate
walk_step, - only used to get viewx and viewy
view_offset, - only used to get viewx and viewy
rset -
